questList.questDescription: The Twilight Ruins are haunted by restless spirits led by the powerful Shadow Wraith, Nyx. To pass through the ruins and continue your journey, you must either vanquish Nyx or convince her to join your cause.
The Ghost Stalker, Eldra, roams the ruins, whispering secrets of the past. Convince Eldra to join your ranks to gain her knowledge and the amulet of healing.
The Spectral Ooze, Gloomveil, spreads its corruption throughout the ruins. Destroy Gloomveil to cleanse the area and earn the amulet of alliance.
The legendary Balrug, Inferno, guards the Crimson Wastes. To proceed, you must either defeat Inferno or persuade him to join you in your quest.
The Slave Demon, Chainbringer, is bound by powerful magic. Free Chainbringer and convince him to join you to receive the amulet of healing.
The Shadow Demon, Umbrax, sows chaos in the Crimson Wastes. Eliminate Umbrax to bring order to the land and gain the amulet of alliance.
Oros, the Unyielding Light, stands as the ultimate threat to the Shadowed Dominion. Defeat Oros to save the realm from his purging light and secure your place as the ruler of the darkness.
Seraphiel, the Dawn's Protector, wields immense power. Convince Seraphiel to join your cause to gain her protection and the amulet of healing.
Zariel, the Flame of Justice, seeks to cleanse the darkness. Defeat Zariel to prevent the purification and earn the amulet of alliance.
